text: Hugonia is a genus of plant in the family Linaceae. The genus was named by Linnaeus after Augustus Johann von Hugo (1686-1760) of Hannover. Species include: * Hugonia deplanchei * Hugonia jenkinsii * Hugonia macrophylla Oliv. * Hugonia micans Engl. * Hugonia mystax L. ==References== Category:Malpighiales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hugonia
